website = | footnotes = }} is a ward of Hamamatsu, Shizuoka, Japan. It is in the middle of the city.区再編ガイドブック（広報はままつ臨時号）PDF版 (in Japanese) Hamamatsu City, November 5, 2023 It is next to Chūō-ku, Tenryū-ku, Iwata, Shizuoka, Kosai, Shizuoka, Shinshiro, Toyohashi. == History== *January 1, 2024 - Old wards of Hamakita-ku and most of Kita-ku will become Hamana-ku. ==References== Category:Settlements in Shizuoka Prefecture Category:Hamamatsu
